strapiPost.title: Centennial Park Wins 'Outdoor Facility of the Year'
strapiPost.content:
The Arkansas Recreation and Parks Association recently awarded Centennial Park its 2022 Outdoor Facility of the Year. 

  • Local winner: Centennial Park is a 228-acre, cycling-activated park with state-of-the-art cyclocross and mountain biking amenities built for world-class events, including the Cyclocross World Championships. The park, featuring two trailheads and 14 miles of soft-surface trails, won in the Over $500,000 category. 
  • In good hands: The park won Outdoor Facility of the Year at the Arkansas Recreation and Parks Association’s Annual Conference in Little Rock. Representatives of the City’s Parks, Natural Resources, and Cultural Affairs Department were on hand to receive the award and bring it home.
